Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can attempt to draw two students holding something (might not resemble a string telephone).
The student might use lines to connect the students, representing some form of communication, though it may not clearly indicate a string.
CANNOT: The student cannot consistently depict the use of cups and string correctly as a string telephone (e.g., might draw random objects, not recognized as a string telephone).
The student cannot accurately demonstrate how sound travels through the string (may not understand how sound works or omit this in the drawing).
The student is unlikely to show how information is sent and received between the students via the string telephone (may not depict any communication elements).
The student is unable to represent technologies helping communication over distances (might think the string is just a decoration rather than a tool).
